prompt: Create an app for Zeppelin Sneaker brand to sell premium sneakers and also add features like sneaker drops to drop limited editions, use AWS for this

umlDiagrams.class:
classDiagram
  class User {
    +userId: int
    +username: string
    +email: string
    +register(): boolean
    +login(): boolean
  }

  class Sneaker {
    +sneakerId: int
    +name: string
    +price: float
    +isLimitedEdition: boolean
    +getDetails(): string
  }

  class Order {
    +orderId: int
    +userId: int
    +sneakerId: int
    +quantity: int
    +placeOrder(): boolean
  }

  class SneakerDrop {
    +dropId: int
    +sneakerId: int
    +dropDate: Date
    +notifyUsers(): void
  }

  User "1" --> "*" Order
  Sneaker "1" --> "*" Order
  Sneaker "1" --> "*" SneakerDrop
  SneakerDrop "1" --> "*" User
umlDiagrams.sequence:
sequenceDiagram
  participant User
  participant MobileApp
  participant API
  participant SneakerService
  participant OrderService
  participant NotificationService

  User->>MobileApp: Browse Sneakers
  MobileApp->>API: Request Sneaker List
  API->>SneakerService: Fetch Sneaker Data
  SneakerService-->>API: Sneaker List
  API-->>MobileApp: Display Sneakers

  User->>MobileApp: Place Order
  MobileApp->>API: Submit Order Details
  API->>OrderService: Process Order
  OrderService-->>API: Order Confirmation
  API-->>MobileApp: Display Confirmation

  SneakerService->>NotificationService: Trigger Sneaker Drop
  NotificationService-->>User: Notify Sneaker Drop
umlDiagrams.component:
flowchart TB
  subgraph Frontend
    web[Web App]
    mobile[Mobile App]
  end

  subgraph Backend
    apiGateway[API Gateway]
    sneakerService[Sneaker Service]
    orderService[Order Service]
    notificationService[Notification Service]
  end

  subgraph Storage
    rds[RDS Database]
    s3[S3 Bucket]
  end

  subgraph Auth
    cognito[Cognito]
  end

  web --> apiGateway
  mobile --> apiGateway
  apiGateway --> sneakerService
  apiGateway --> orderService
  apiGateway --> notificationService
  sneakerService --> rds
  orderService --> rds
  notificationService --> s3
  apiGateway --> cognito
umlDiagrams.architecture:
architecture-beta
  group frontend(logos:aws-amplify)[Frontend]
    service web_app(logos:aws-amplify)[Web App] in frontend
    service mobile_app(logos:aws-amplify)[Mobile App] in frontend
  end

  group backend(logos:aws-lambda)[Backend]
    service api_gateway(logos:aws-api-gateway)[API Gateway] in backend
    service sneaker_service(logos:aws-lambda)[Sneaker Service] in backend
    service order_service(logos:aws-lambda)[Order Service] in backend
    service notification_service(logos:aws-lambda)[Notification Service] in backend
  end

  group storage(logos:aws-rds)[Storage]
    service rds(logos:aws-rds)[RDS Database] in storage
    service s3(logos:aws-s3)[S3 Bucket] in storage
  end

  group auth(logos:aws-cognito)[Auth]
    service cognito(logos:aws-cognito)[Cognito] in auth
  end

  web_app:R --> L:api_gateway
  mobile_app:R --> L:api_gateway
  api_gateway:R --> L:sneaker_service
  api_gateway:R --> L:order_service
  api_gateway:R --> L:notification_service
  sneaker_service:R --> L:rds
  order_service:R --> L:rds
  notification_service:R --> L:s3
  api_gateway:R --> L:cognito
